text: @NatashaBertrand It’s the same reason u don’t panic the markets. We don’t need people jumping off buildings. It absolutely had to be eased into. No other safe way to do it and it worked. Covid-19 is a $hit sandwich for everyone. It was here in December. Nothing could stop it then or now.
